greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Largest k<n such that 2*composite(n)=composite(n-k)+composite(n+k).
mathematica: Composite[n_Integer] := FixedPoint[n + PrimePi@# + 1 &, n + PrimePi@ n + 1]; f[n_] := Block[{k = n - 1, m = Composite@ n}, While[k > 0 && 2 m != Composite[n + k] + Composite[n - k], k--]; k]; Array[f, 75]
results.author: _Juri-Stepan Gerasimov_, Dec 26 2010, Dec 31 2010
